original_title: Nascidos na Luta, vivendo na Vitória
overview: Portrait of the children born while the war was still going on and members of the Pioneers, MPLA’s youth organisation. As the title predicts, the film is made at a time when, in the aftermath of the Independence War, there’s hope in the future of Angola and the revolution.
title: Nascidos na Luta, vivendo na Vitória
